casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Doraine REED Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2017

James B. Streeto, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Mitchell S. Brody, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 537, 169 A.3d 326 (2017), is denied.
